room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: Did the zombie room. Lots of fun, we died. Way more challenging than I expected. We were a group of 3 and 4 put in together, they said typical it’s 12. Pretty small room for 12 and the zombie starts with a lot of range, I can’t imagine people avoiding the zombie too well. But it was extremely fun.

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: Love this place! Visited for the first time with my 7 year old and friends...played miniature golf, bowled, even drive a go-kart indoors!!! Good times!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: So much fun.. And the zombie was very good!! We had all the clues, but ran out of time

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: Trapped in a room with a zombie was pretty pricey but the kids said it was the best time ever! Would recommend for anyone 10+ & up for a fun time

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: It is fun for the entire family young and Old! I was visiting my daughter and granddaughters and we were looking for something to do on a rainy day. Well let me tell you this is not only a rainy day entertainment center but an ANY Day entertainment center! Will be visiting again next time I am in Ohio!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: The steering committee for our young professionals group NEXT YP recently did the Trapped in a Room with a Zombie and it was an AWESOME team building activity. The staff and even the zombie were great!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: My son celebrated his 4th birthday on October 3. He and all his friends/guests had so much fun. Everything was well organized by the staff and we stayed on schedule. We played golf and bowling and kids really enjoyed both. John our event helper was great! He helped with everything and we as parents didnt have to do much but enjoy the party.

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: Trapped in a room with a zombie was pretty pricey but the kids said it was the best time ever! Would recommend for anyone 10+ & up for a fun time
